WorkItem.ClosedComment: We have several pending requests for "read-only" in the language already
WorkItem.Description: If I have a getter but no setter the compiler should warn me when I assign the the variable. I'm not sure what the language definition is but if there is a getter I presume any value I set would be inaccessible so this should at least rate a warning, especially when I use have a computed value and want to catch any inadvertent attempts to set the value.
